full_title: Slow It Down by Benson Boone
title: Slow It Down

description.plain:
“Slow It Down” is the second single dedicated towards pop singer-songwriter Benson Boone’s debut studio album, Fireworks & Rollerblades. It serves as the third track on the record.

Some sources have labeled this cut as an “aching, piano-driven number,” and had labeled it as evidence that Boone “had found his niche.”

“Slow It Down” was digitally released on March 21st, 2024, which came alongside the official announcement of Fireworks & Rollerblades. Boone first teased it on his social media in a video that was posted on January 8th, about two months prior to the song’s release.

Then you walked in with those green eyes
Never stolen by nobody
And they flicker to the future
For a moment, I could picture
Then you touch me and I come back
And we're talking on the staircase
'Bout your big dreams on the big screens

Oh, now you're crying, you're in pieces
'Cause the only love you've ever known is Jesus
